summary: Adds craftable toys for your HearthFires children.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffff00][size=2][b]The mod is no longer supported by the author.
Feel free to use my assets in your mods/ports with a proper credit.
Enjoy your game and have a nice day :)[/b][/size][/color][/font]

[size=3] [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63299/]Skyrim Toy Story - TRADUZIONE ITALIANA -SKI- by [b]Ciccigomma[/b][/url]


[color=#ffff00] - Tedd[/color][color=#ffff00]y Bears are now using Tamira's mesh (as the previous one was hardly "texturable") and have new textures
 - Toy Doll Basket is now x1.3 bigger and has new texture
 - Added Big Dolls (x1.5 from the original doll size) with 3 different textures
 - Added bigger Toy Dragons + new textures
 - Added new texture for Toy Ship
 - Added Toy Dwemer Cube (x1.5 from the vannila one)
 - Gingerbread House is now craftable in HF oven
 - Changed craft components for almost all items
 - All toys are now giftable to both boys and girls[/color]



Now that my Skyrim kids are [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45642/]properly dressed[/url] I turned to another aspect of their life - toys.
I didn t like that:
1) There are only two toys I can offer to my children in the vanilla gameplay.
2) I'm a Master Crafter and cannot make a simple wooden toy for my kids.
3) Child's room looks just as any other room ingame and it's so dull.

So I made this mod, adding 16 toys that are
- craftable - you can create them at tanning rack, forge and cooking pot
- giftable - though kids won't interact with the objects, they will still say "Thanks!"
- may serve as good lore-friendly decorations for children's rooms - just scatter them all over the floor and this will look exactly like a normal child's room :)
[center][/center]

[color=#ffff00]HearthFires DLC is requierd![/color]



[b][color=#52a2d9]Toy Bears[/color][/b]
Craftable at Tanning Rack.
Mesh by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16625/]Tamira[/url]

[b][color=#52a2d9]Toy Doll Basket[/color][/b]
Craftable at Tanning Rack.

[b][color=#52a2d9]Toy Big Dolls[/color][/b]
Craftable at Tanning Rack.

[b][color=#52a2d9]Toy Dragons[/color][/b]
Craftable at Forge.
Mesh by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26132/]Runspect[/url]

[b][color=#52a2d9]Toy Rocking Horses[/color][/b]
Craftable at Forge.
Mesh by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17332/]Tamira[/url]

[b][color=#52a2d9]Toy Shield[/color][/b]
Craftable at Forge.
Hiccup's shield from HTTYD wallpaper :) Based on Iron Shield, so it can be normally equipped.

[b][color=#52a2d9]Toy Ship[/color][/b]
Craftable at Forge.

[b][color=#52a2d9]Toy Dwemer Cube[/color][/b]
Craftable at Forge.

[b][color=#52a2d9]Toy Gingerbread House[/color][/b]
Craftable at Oven.


Use NNM activation.
Or extract the archive you downloaded and place the files into your Skyrim/Data folder.
Activate the ESP file in Launcher.



- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26132/]Runspect[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17332/]Tamira[/url] for their great modders resources.
- Bethesda for creating TES games
- Adobe for creating Photoshop
- All of you for your attention :)
author: jacknifelee
